thread.title: BRIEF-Taiwan Leader Biotech to issue 4.7 mln new shares for working capital supplement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Taiwan Leader Biotech to issue 4.7 mln new shares for working capital supplement
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Taiwan Leader Biotech Corp :
* Says it plans to issue 4.7 million new shares with par value of T$10 per share and tentative issue price at T$30 per share for working capital supplement
* Says 10 percent of the new shares will be offered to the companyâ€™s employees, remaining 90 percent will be offered to the existing shareholders
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/6xG53e
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
